name: Kiwi
text: I'm a flightless bird who is native to New Zealand!

name: Kiwi
text: Stoats, ferrets and weasels are my predators...

name: Kiwi
text: I'm an endangered species. Kiwi adults and eggs are eaten.

name: Kiwi
text: We depend on you humans to keep us safe, I trust you.

name: Kiwi
text: You probably already knew all about me already,

name: Kiwi
text: since I have a really serious job of representing Aotearoa's citizens!

name: Kiwi
text: ...Aotearoa? what's that? Aotearoa is New Zealand's original name!

name: Kiwi
text: You're a really awesome person if you can say it properly :)
